price: Dájúdájú ní òní, àwọn èrò inú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra yóò kún fún ìgbádùn.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
